
Tutorials
===========
These tutorials are geared at familiarizing new users with navigating and querying data in PredictiveGrid.

We start with a short video demonstrating **The Plotter**, and then jump into a series of Jupyter Notebooks to help users get the most out of our API.


.. toctree::
   :caption: Plotter Video
   :maxdepth: 1

   plotter-demo


.. toctree::
   :caption: API Use
   :maxdepth: 2

   collections
   streams
   streamsets
   plots
   statpoints
   queries
   metadata
   windows
   plotaggregates
